title: Fps Problems on all settings
body:
I was playing  a game earlier when i looked up ans saw that my fps was at 50. That doesn't sound bad except for the fact that my cap is at 120 and if i don't cap it a get 180-200 average. It just started happening with this new patch and nothing else on my PC runs differently fps wise. If anybody could help me out then that would be great. 

p.s my drivers are up to date so don't bother saying to update them.

replies.body:
Hey SpK Ballpit, 

You may want to try Riots FPS KB. That should fix the issue up. 

Riot's FPS KB:https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting

I hope this get's your problem all fixed up! 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
